message:
Ami Dubai theke bolchi......
Hefajater longmarch a ongsho nite na parar je koto costo, ta kaw-k bole bujanu jabe na. Allah musolmander ai andulon k kobul korun & amader bijoy dan korun. Longmarch a asha shokol muslim bhai der-k Dubai Bangladeshider pokko theke mubarakbad janacchi. (ফ্যান পোস্ট)
